title.rendered: VT Markets’ Premier Event at the Monaco E-Prix

content.rendered:
VT Markets, a leading global multi-asset broker, is set to host its largest event to date – a special three-day event in Monaco, where their principal partner, the Formula E team Maserati MSG Racing, is based.

Scheduled from April 25th to April 27th, this exclusive event invites select VIP guests, partners, and members of the media to enjoy unique experiences. These include a media event, a private yacht tour along the Monaco coast, and the chance to witness the excitement of the Formula E race firsthand.

Highlights of the media event include keynote speeches from VT Markets and Maserati MSG Racing representatives, offering attendees a deep dive into the future of trading and the ongoing collaboration between the two organizations. This partnership focuses on mutual goals of seizing new opportunities and driving forward momentum.

Ludovic Moncla, VT Markets’ Head of Affiliates, commented on the upcoming year: “We are gearing up for an ambitious 2024, aiming to expand our global presence and continue offering our clients unparalleled opportunities and service excellence”.
“This event highlights our commitment to improving the client experience, supported by our recent accreditation by the Financial Commission. We’re excited about what the future holds” Moncla added.
A Maserati MSG Racing spokesperson shared: “Our partnership with VT Markets is poised to open new doors for both entities. With a shared ethos of innovation and high performance, we’re eager to engage new audiences and achieve shared successes”.

The event promises stimulating discussions, networking sessions, and exclusive insights into the trading industry’s future. For more information about this event, please visit the VT Markets Events webpage. Press and media inquiries for event access or more details can be directed here.
